channel.title: Project-Standard [317]
channel.description:
Hey MoparScapians, this is my first development topic (still a new, and horrible, coder).
The reason for the name is because it's a standard 317 server.
CREDITS: [code] The base source is ReneScape 317 (credits for him for stuff already programmed in)
The base client is trytohaxme's 317 client (credits to him for the client) [/code]
So far I haven't started anything, but downloaded the source + client.
Here's what I'm going to work on:
Magic 100%, all spells for all books (except lunar) Range 100%, all range items will work (even cross bows, bolts, gfx, etc;) Full combat for 317, will hopefully have a good base written out by today, HOPEFULLY.
I will add more to this later, for now I have school work :)
If you want to join just fill this app out: [code] Name: Age: MSN and/or Ventrilo: Coding/Programming experience/languages known: Why do you want to join and what do you want to help with: [/code]
So yeah guys, thanks for looking :)
